title: Perman (1983) Specials
sinopse: Perman (1983) specials that were not included in the episode count when the show originally aired. The DVD Box set did include the latter two (Bird Sei e no Michi and Copy World no Nazo) as a part of the ep count as episode 222 and 415 respectively, bumping up the show's total ep count to 528 for its release.
